quote_01: One man practising sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it.
quote_02: Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.
quote_03: Football doesn't build character, it reveals character.
quote_04: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. They must run with hope in their heart and dreams in their head.
quote_05: Age is no barrier, it's a limitation you put on your mind.
quote_06: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
quote_07: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quote_08: The sky has no limits, neither should you.
quote_09: People react to criticism in different ways, and my way is definitely to come out fighting.
quote_10: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quote_11: You can't put a limit on anything.
quote_12: My coach said I run like a girl, I said if he ran a little faster he could too.
quote_13: In every game there is going to be a crossroad, and when you get to that crossroad, you either step up, or step you down. It is entirely all up to you. You make the decision, not me.
quote_14: Never quit. It is the easiest cop-out in the world. Set a goal and don't quit until you attain it. When you do attain it, set another goal, and don't quit until you reach it. Never quit.
quote_15: Let me tell you what winning means...  you're willing to go longer, work harder, give more than anyone else.
quote_16: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quote_17: If you only ever give 90% in training then you will only ever give 90% when it matters.
quote_18: Dedication requires determination and determination requires dedication. Being number one means to be both, but being both doesn't make number one.
quote_19: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
quote_20: Make sure your worst enemy doesn't live between your own ears.
quote_21: What makes something special is not just what you have to gain, but what you feel there is to lose.
quote_22: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
quote_23: One man can be a crucial ingedient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
quote_24: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
quote_25: If you have everything under control, you're not moving fast enough.
quote_26: Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds.
quote_27: It is not the size of a man but the size of his heart that matters.
quote_28: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quote_29: It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get up.
quote_30: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.
quote_31: A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever.
quote_32: There may be people that have more talent than you, but theres no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
quote_33: I've learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.
quote_34: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quote_35: If you can't outplay them, outwork them.
quote_36: You were born to be a player. You were meant to be here. This moment is yours.
quote_37: When you win, say nothing, when you lose, say less.
quote_38: I never left the field saying I could have done more to get ready and that gives me piece of mind.
quote_39: If you train hard, you'll not only be hard, you'll be hard to beat.
quote_40: The will to win is important, but the will to prepare is vital.
quote_41: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does - that makes you a winner rightthere.
quote_42: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
quote_43: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
quote_44: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victor.
quote_45: Never say never because limits, like fears, are often an illusion.
quote_46: When you've got something to prove, there's nothing greater than a challenge.
quote_47: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
quote_48: Success is where prepration and opportunity meet.
quote_49: There are three types of people. Those who make it happen, those who watch it happen and those who wonder what happened.
quote_50: Sports have the power to change the world. It has the power to inspire, the power to unite people in a way that little else does.
quote_51: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
